abstract: Carl C. Icahn will get to keep — and run — CVR Energy, an oil refining company based in Texas, after a 60-day sale process failed to yield any credible bids.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn will get to keep — and run — CVR Energy, an oil refining company based in Texas, after a 60-day sale process failed to yield any credible bids.
lead_paragraph: CVR Energy said on Thursday that it had not received any credible offers to acquire the company, leaving it in the hands of Carl C. Icahn, who gained control of the Texas refiner this spring after a lengthy battle.

headline.main: Icahn Posts Win as CVR Energy Says It Had No Offers
